CSVFormatter()

class mantis_monitor.formatter.csv_formatter.CSVFormatter¶
open(filename)¶

Take the Formatter file format or type and transform it to the UDF

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to the location of the file to read

Returns:

None

save(filename, data)¶

Take the UDF and transform it to the desired Formatter file format or type

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – Path to the location of the new file

  • data (pandas.DataFrame()) – UDF Pandas DataFrame

Returns:

None
